smile.description: Hey there! I'm a cheerful face with a big, open smile. I'm here to show happiness and spread good vibes!

smile_with_big_eyes.description: Hello! I'm a happy face with a big smile and bright, smiling eyes. Let's spread joy and positivity together!

grin.description: Hi! I'm a joyful face with a wide grin, showing teeth and sometimes a tongue. I'm here to express pure delight!

laughing.description: Haha! I'm a laughing face with a big smile and squinting eyes. Use me when something is super funny!

joy.description: Hey! I'm a face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on my side as if rolling on the floor laughing.

star_struck.description: Wow! I'm a face with a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth on most platforms, with stars for eyes, as if seeing a beloved celebrity.

kissing_heart.description: Mwah! I'm a face with simple, open eyes and puckered lips giving a kiss. I convey love and affection.

kissing.description: Mwah! I'm a face with simple, open eyes and puckered lips giving a kiss. I convey love and affection.

kissing_smiling_eyes.description: Mwah! I'm a face with simple, open eyes and puckered lips giving a kiss. I convey love and affection.

partying_face.description: Yay! I'm a face with a party hat blowing a party horn as confetti floats around my head. Let's celebrate joyous occasions and important events!

Pleading.description: Please! I'm a face with furrowed eyebrows, a small frown, and large, puppy dog eyes, as if begging or pleading. I may also represent adoration or feeling touched by a loving gesture.

thinking_face.description: Hmm... I'm a face with furrowed eyebrows looking upwards with thumb and index finger resting on my chin. I'm here to show deep thought or pondering.

zipper_mouth.description: Shh! I'm a face with simple, open eyes and a closed zipper for a mouth. I convey a secret or that someone will keep one (e.g., My lips are sealed).

screeming.description: Ahh! I'm a face with a big open grin, squinting eyes, and raised eyebrows. I often convey hysterical laughter more intense than Face With Tears of Joy.

rage.description: Grr! I'm a face with an open frown and raised eyebrows, giving a sense of anger or frustration. I may also represent someone acting tough or being mean.

sweat.description: Phew! I'm a face with a big grin and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, tilted on my side as if rolling on the floor laughing.

surprised.description: Oh! I'm a face with open eyes, raised eyebrows, and an open mouth, as if gasping in shock or surprise.

scrunched_mouth.description: Shh! I'm a face with simple, open eyes and a closed zipper for a mouth. I convey a secret or that someone will keep one (e.g., My lips are sealed).

mind_blown.description: Whoa! I'm a face with a big open grin, squinting eyes, and raised eyebrows. I often convey hysterical laughter more intense than Face With Tears of Joy.
